name: Random Adventure
description:
Random Adventure v 0.1 Alpha 

- I made a game and this is the start too it all. I hope you guys enjoy the rage and there will be a lot more added in v 0.2. Right now I am testing too see how people feel about this game before I dive deeper into the pit so enjoy what there is so far :). 

Welcome to Random Adventure, if you are reading this that means you have accepted the challenge to rage as hard as possible. Please beware, you will rage, you will give up, you may have times where you feel this game is impossible. This is exactly how you are suppose to feel. This game is beatable and will be updated over time. Any bugs, glitches, small errors, or anything to make the game harder will be added. Oh also if you have a suggestion to add into the game feel free too tell me and I will add it. ENJOY RANDOM ADVENTURE !!!

Email - Hooddevon4@gmail.com
